alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 6:13PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Logan County in west central Nebraska... Eastern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 613 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles north of Hershey to 12 miles south of Ringgold to 12 miles north of Maxwell, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Stapleton, Tryon, Gandy, Ringgold, Logan, Tarboz Lake, Shanklin Bluff, Hoagland and Brown Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 199 and 244. Highway 97 between mile markers 9 and 44. Highway 83 between mile markers 97 and 130. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
